root: ^So, why did you take me to the pawn shop?
^Well, a few weeks ago, you gave me instructions for in case you were in trouble.
^You gave me this ticket, and said if you ever gave me the signal for "code green," to come here and get your watch back.
^Silvia gives you a ticket to reclaim a watch you pawned at this store.
^Yes, and you were very serious. The most serious I've ever seen you.
^I thought at least coming here might jog your memory, espeically if there's something urgent going on.
^Unfortunately, nothing is coming back to me. What kind of plan did I have? Was that all I told you?
^That's all you said. You seemed so serious, I didn't want to pry any further.
^But, since we're here, maybe seeing that watch will help yor remember? It must be very important.
